original: rva mdog aindra n'i la'i 'od 'phro zhing //
analyzed: rva mdog aindra n'i la'i 'od 'phro zhing //
translated: His horns shine with the light of sapphire,

original: h'um dang chem dang sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs //
analyzed: h'um dang chem dang sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs //
translated: And he utters the sounds of ‚Äúhum,‚Äù ‚Äúchem,‚Äù and a great terrifying roar.

original: zhal nas ljags 'dril he he he he dz'a //üîΩston ka'i char sprin gzhon nu 'jigs pa'i zhal //
analyzed: zhal nas ljags 'dril he he he he dz'a // ston ka'i char sprin gzhon nu 'jigs pa'i zhal //
translated: From his mouth he rolls out his tongue, saying ‚Äúhe he he he ja.‚ÄùüîΩHis terrifying face is like a young autumn rain cloud,

original: nam mkha'i a'anytsa'i mdog 'dra sngon por snang //
analyzed: nam mkha'i a'anytsa'i mdog 'dra sngon por snang //
translated: And he appears blue, like the color of the a√±jana tree.

original: pad dang padma r'a ga'i mdog 'dra gnyis //
analyzed: pad dang padma r'a ga'i mdog 'dra gnyis //
translated: Two of his faces are the color of a lotus and a ruby,

original: gser bsrags  dang mtshungs che ba'i yon tan ldan //
analyzed: gser bsrags  dang mtshungs che ba'i yon tan ldan //
translated: And two are the color of refined gold, endowed with great qualities.

original: shel dang dung 'dra zla ba zhi ba'i tshul //
analyzed: shel dang dung 'dra zla ba zhi ba'i tshul //
translated: Two are the color of crystal and a conch, and are peaceful like the moon.üîΩOne is the color of a partridge, and is extremely wrathful.

original: sre ya ka ltar dung kha rab tu drag / dgu pa bzhin khros byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
analyzed: sre ya ka ltar dung kha rab tu drag / dgu pa bzhin khros byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
translated: He is adorned with the ornaments of a child, and his ninth face is wrathful.

original: thod pa lnga bcu se ral khar bsnams pa //
analyzed: thod pa lnga bcu se ral khar bsnams pa //
translated: He wears a garland of fifty skulls over his shoulder,

original: rkang tshil khrag dang zhag bcas glo snying gsol //üîΩsri ka dushd'a na h'um na ma ra na /
analyzed: rkang tshil khrag dang zhag bcas glo snying gsol // sri ka dushd'a na h'um na ma ra na /
translated: And he eats lungs, hearts, blood, fat, and marrow.üîΩ‚ÄúKill! Kill! Destroy! Destroy!üîΩDestroy all enemies! Destroy all obstructors!

original: sh'irt'am pushta ma h'a ma ra dza /
analyzed: sh'irt'am pushta ma h'a ma ra dza /
translated: Destroy all those who are hostile! Destroy! Destroy!

original: las rnams ma lus rdzogs pa mthar phyin pas //
analyzed: las rnams ma lus rdzogs pa mthar phyin pas //
translated: ‚ÄúBy perfecting all activities without exception,

original: sems can khams rnams ma lus kun don mdzod //
analyzed: sems can khams rnams ma lus kun don mdzod //
translated: You accomplish the welfare of all sentient beings without exception.

original: gri gug la sogs pa rdzogs pa'i mtshan mar ldan //
analyzed: gri gug la sogs pa rdzogs pa'i mtshan mar ldan //
translated: You are endowed with the complete signs, such as the flaying knife, and so on.

original: dbu mgo chen po'i tshogs ni gyen du sgreng //
analyzed: dbu mgo chen po'i tshogs ni gyen du sgreng //
translated: You erect the great head of the central channel.

original: yan lag rags pa'i lto ni thur du bshal //
analyzed: yan lag rags pa'i lto ni thur du bshal //
translated: You hang down the belly of the coarse body.

original: dz'a dz'a ki ki h'um h'um ha la ha /
analyzed: dz'a dz'a ki ki h'um h'um ha la ha /
translated: You accomplish all activities, such as ja ja, ki ki, hu·πÉ hu·πÉ, ha la ha,

original: ha ha ya ya ma ma ra ra zhes /üîΩtsa tsha las rnams ma lus kun mdzad pa //
analyzed: ha ha ya ya ma ma ra ra zhes / tsa tsha las rnams ma lus kun mdzad pa //
translated: ha ha, ya ya, ma ma, ra ra,üîΩca tsa, and so on.

original: slob dpon skur dang de yi dkor khyed dang // kun la gnod byed dam bskur ba dang // dam tshig dag la mi gnas sgrol bar byed //
analyzed: slob dpon skur dang de yi dkor khyed dang // kun la gnod byed dam bskur ba dang // dam tshig dag la mi gnas sgrol bar byed //
translated: You are the master, the body, and you are the wealth. You harm everyone, and you are the slanderer. You do not abide in the pure samaya.

original: rdo rje thod dbyig 'jigs pa'i sgra dang ldan //
analyzed: rdo rje thod dbyig 'jigs pa'i sgra dang ldan //
translated: You are the vajra skull club with a terrifying sound.

original: mi dang ma he la sogs pa de bzhin bya rog 'ug / bya rgod zhabs kyis gnon pa'i sku tsa ra bzhugs //
analyzed: mi dang ma he la sogs pa de bzhin bya rog 'ug / bya rgod zhabs kyis gnon pa'i sku tsa ra bzhugs //
translated: You stand with your feet trampling on humans, buffaloes, and so on, as well as crows, owls, and vultures.

original: hal mgrin bzang mar khu chen po gsol //
analyzed: hal mgrin bzang mar khu chen po gsol //
translated: You are delighted by the great elixir of alcohol.

original: aa shva da la sogs shing dbus dgyes par gsol //
analyzed: aa shva da la sogs shing dbus dgyes par gsol //
translated: You are delighted by the center of the trees, such as the a≈õoka tree, and so on.

original: spyang ki kang+ga 'bar ba ce spyang dang // bya rog khra dang ma h'a ru lu ni //
analyzed: spyang ki kang+ga 'bar ba ce spyang dang // bya rog khra dang ma h'a ru lu ni //
translated: The jackal, the wolf, the crow, the hawk, and the owl,

original: gdug pa can rnams ma lus sha za ba'i //
analyzed: gdug pa can rnams ma lus sha za ba'i //
translated: The entire assembly of the most ferocious flesh-eaters,

original: tshogs kyi phyogs ni de bzhin sprin ltar gtibs //
analyzed: tshogs kyi phyogs ni de bzhin sprin ltar gtibs //
translated: Like clouds, gather in the same way.

original: de 'dra'i dbus kyi gzhal yas khang pa na //
analyzed: de 'dra'i dbus kyi gzhal yas khang pa na //
translated: In the middle of this palace,

original: tshul du bzhugs pas sems can 'gro don mdzad //
analyzed: tshul du bzhugs pas sems can 'gro don mdzad //
translated: He sits in the manner of a hero, acting for the benefit of beings.

original: rol mdzad thugs rjes sprul la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rol mdzad thugs rjes sprul la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the emanation of compassion, the one who plays!

original: gdug pa zhal du gsol la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gdug pa zhal du gsol la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one who devours the wicked!

original: las rnams mthar phyin mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: las rnams mthar phyin mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one who accomplishes all actions!

original: khro tshogs 'jigs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: khro tshogs 'jigs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the body that terrifies the assembly of wrathful ones!

original: autpala sngo 'dra'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: autpala sngo 'dra'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the body that is like a blue lotus!

original: nyi ma brgya yi gzi ldan phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: nyi ma brgya yi gzi ldan phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one who possesses the brilliance of a hundred suns!üîΩThose who remember his name and praise him,

original: @221a * // 'ga' zhig mtshan ni 'dzin zhing bstod pa dang // de yi yon tan phyogs tsam bzung nas kyang //
analyzed: @221a * // 'ga' zhig mtshan ni 'dzin zhing bstod pa dang // de yi yon tan phyogs tsam bzung nas kyang //
translated: And who hold just a fraction of his qualities in their mind,

original: yid la gnas kyi gzhan du mi smra na //
analyzed: yid la gnas kyi gzhan du mi smra na //
translated: And do not speak of him elsewhere,

original: dngos grub ster zhing las rnams ma lus 'gugs //
analyzed: dngos grub ster zhing las rnams ma lus 'gugs //
translated: Bestows spiritual powers and attracts all activities without exception.

original: 'jam dpal 'jigs byed mtshan gyi bstod pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal 'jigs byed mtshan gyi bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Names of Ma√±juvajra

original: slob dpon las kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon las kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: Composed by Master Karmavajra.
